sentence.Network_en: French Enlightenment writer, deist and philosopher Voltaire died at the age of 84 on May 30 th.
sentence.Network_cn: 1778年5月30日,法国启蒙作家 、 自然神论信仰者、哲学家伏尔泰逝世.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 其实他是一个自然神论者（Deist）；不过在这时代及其后许多时，人都称反基督教的自然神论者为无神论者而不以为怪。他的著作若 …

list.abs: ...而且讽刺的是,他是神圣的剑桥大学三一学院的院士,著名科学哲学家李察·威斯科称牛顿为,原型自然神论者,proto-deist,所谓,自然神论,是相信神创造这世界之后,就让自然规律去统治这个世界,自己再不插手,世界在自然规律的.
...Roman Catholics）的会友，另有三位是自然神教（deists）的信仰者。
...今日教会里有许多人相信神仍然医治, 但他们所为却像自然神教信徒(deists), 甚少带著期盼为病人按手祷告。一个原因是他们将指望期.

means.word_mean: 1. a person who believes that God created the universe and then abandoned it

auth_sentence.content: Mentioning that Jefferson was a deist was a nice touch.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mentioning that Jefferson was a deist was a nice touch.

auth_sentence.content: But perhaps you are a deist and this is all okay with you.
auth_sentence.res_content: But perhaps you are a deist and this is all okay with you.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But perhaps you are a deist and this is all okay with you.

auth_sentence.content: The Deist theology has much that does not correspond to the Christian theology.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Deist theology has much that does not correspond to the Christian theology.
